ZONE 1.notes: High productivity; watch for fungi on the northern coast and water scarcity in the south.

ZONE 2.notes: Use greenhouses/tunnels to start early; efficient irrigation in summer; good for olive, almond and grapevine.

ZONE 3.notes: Good for leafy and irrigated crops; monitor humidity-related pests; crop rotation recommended.

ZONE 4.notes: Delay cold-sensitive transplants until May; use companion planting (corn+bean+pumpkin).

ZONE 5.notes: Favors tropical/subtropical crops; manage drainage due to high rainfall in rainy periods.

Harvest: Ano inteiro com picos em Inverno
